text: @realDonaldTrump For who? Not  #cronycapitalists who've bought off @GOP  @DNC  militarizing a country in the throes of #fascism. Rather than handle #COVID19 appropriately, you ignored it until too late and now thousands dead, ill & 41M unemployed. @HowieHawkins @AngelaNWalker @hoffman4US2020

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
